metadata.title: Pricing
metadata.description: Choose a plan that fits your fitness goals

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Turn everyday objects into personalized workout videos with AI. Choose the plan that fits your fitness goals and start training today.

items.title: Free Plan
items.description: Start your AI fitness journey. Perfect for trying out our service and experiencing personalized workout videos.
features: 3 credits granted to new users upon registration
items.tip: No credit card required. Start generating workout videos today.

items.title: 20 Credits
items.description: Perfect for occasional use. Generate workout videos whenever you want to train with objects around you.
items.tip: One-time purchase. Credits never expire, use them whenever you want to work out.

items.title: 60 Credits
items.description: Most Popular - Best value for regular users. Generate workout videos regularly and share your fitness journey.
items.label: Most Popular
features: Save 33% compared to buying 20 credits three times
Share videos with family and friends
items.tip: Best value! Save 33% and never worry about running out of credits.

messages.seo_tooltip_content: Our pricing is designed to provide value and flexibility. We offer credit-based plans that never expire, allowing you to generate personalized AI workout videos whenever you want. Transparent pricing ensures you only pay for what you use, with no hidden fees or recurring subscriptions. Perfect for fitness enthusiasts looking to train with everyday objects.
